column3: [' (StepDescription: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk)']
[' (StepDescription: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug)']
[' (StepDescription: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug)']
[' (StepDescription: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve)']
